DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effects of a physiological bolus of growth hormone on insulin signaling pathways in muscle tissue in healthy lean men.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Growth Hormone on Insulin Signaling in Muscle Tissue
DOC.criteria: Male Healthy Age between 18 and 30 years BMI â‰¤ 26 Known present disease including diabetes mellitus BMI > 26 Uses any medication Consumes > 21 units of alcohol per week
